title: 250th Anniversary of the Battle of Bunker Hill
summary:
The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump commemorating the 250th anniversary of the Battle of Bunker Hill, dated June 17, 2025. It reflects on the historical significance of the battle, where American patriots, despite being outnumbered and outgunned, demonstrated extraordinary courage against British forces. The proclamation emphasizes the revolutionary spirit that emerged in the American Colonies following earlier battles, leading to the mobilization of thousands of militiamen to defend their homeland.

Key elements include the strategic actions taken by Colonial leaders to fortify Breeds Hill, the famous order from Colonel Prescott to hold fire until the British were close, and the fierce fighting that ensued. Although the British ultimately took the ground, the Americans inflicted significant casualties, inspiring a sense of morale and determination among the colonists.

The proclamation serves to honor the bravery of those who fought, asserting that their actions sent a powerful message of resilience and unity against tyranny. It concludes with a call to celebrate the spirit of Bunker Hill, linking it to the ongoing defense of freedom and patriotism in the United States.
